content.5: And the streets of the city shall be full of boys and girls playing in the streets thereof.
content.8: And I will bring them, and they shall dwell in the midst of Jerusalem: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God, in truth and in righteousness.

content.15: So again have I thought in these days to do well unto Jerusalem and to the house of Judah: fear ye not.
